verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-upon נְגִינַ֬ת <WH5058> ne-gi-Nat upon Neginah לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David שִׁמְעָ֣ה <WH8085> shim-'Ah Hear אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God רִנָּתִ֑י <WH7440> rin-na-Ti; my cry הַ֝קְשִׁ֗יבָה <WH7181> hak-Shi-vah, attend תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti. unto my prayer

מִקְצֵ֤ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh From the end הָאָ֨רֶץ׀ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the earth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about אֶ֭קְרָא <WH7121> 'Ek-ra will I cry בַּעֲטֹ֣ף <WH5848> ba-'a-Tof is overwhelmed לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> lib-Bi; unto thee when my heart בְּצוּר־ <WH6697> be-tzur- me to the rock יָר֖וּם <WH7311> ya-Rum [that] is higher מִמֶּ֣נִּי <WH4480> mi-Men-ni than תַנְחֵֽנִי׃ <WH5148> tan-Che-ni. lead

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta have been מַחְסֶ֣ה <WH4268> mach-Seh For thou hast been a shelter לִ֑י Li; מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> mig-dal- tower עֹ֝֗ז <WH5797> 'Oz, for me [and] a strong מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> o-Yev. the enemy

אָג֣וּרָה <WH1481> 'a-Gu-rah I will abide בְ֭אָהָלְךָ <WH168> Ve-'a-hal-cha in thy tabernacle עוֹלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> o-la-Mim; for ever אֶֽחֱסֶ֨ה <WH2620> 'e-che-Seh I will trust בְסֵ֖תֶר <WH5643> ve-Se-ter in the covert כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <WH3671> ke-na-Fei-cha of thy wings סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah O אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him For thou O God שָׁמַ֣עְתָּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ta hast heard לִנְדָרָ֑י <WH5088> lin-da-Rai; my vows נָתַ֥תָּ <WH5414> na-Ta-ta thou hast given יְ֝רֻשַּׁ֗ת <WH3425> ye-rush-Shat, [me] the heritage יִרְאֵ֥י <WH3373> yir-'Ei of those that fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. thy name

יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> ya-Mim life עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יְמֵי־ <WH3117> ye-mei- life מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king's תּוֹסִ֑יף <WH3254> to-Sif; Thou wilt prolong שְׁ֝נוֹתָ֗יו <WH8141> no-Tav, [and] his years כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- will be as דֹ֥ר <WH1755> dor as many וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. generations

יֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> ye-Shev He shall abide ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> o-lom for ever לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> ve-'e-Met, and truth מַ֣ן <WH4487> man O prepare יִנְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <WH5341> yin-tze-Ru-hu. [which] may preserve

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken So אֲזַמְּרָ֣ה <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Rah So will I sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha praise unto thy name לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> la-'Ad; for ever לְֽשַׁלְּמִ֥י <WH7999> le-shal-le-Mi perform נְדָרַ֗י <WH5088> ne-da-Rai, my vows י֣וֹם׀ <WH3117> Yom day יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> Yom. day
